short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block users on Twitter in one click instead of 3. Block from any page where users are listed (/retweets, /followers, etc)!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension modifies Twitter by adding a block button to each Tweet. The block button that is added enables a user to block the owner of the Tweet in one click instead of the usual 3 clicks (1. open tweet menu, 2. click block user, 3. confirm block)

You can now block users from ANYWHERE! There's now a block button on the list of users on the Followers and Reposts pages. This is a universal 1-click solution to your Twitter blocking problems.
